div.p: Have a student that you think would be a great fit for AVID? Please send them this online application and tell them to apply! We are collecting applications at this time for any and all students grades 5th-10th, and 11th AVID students only. The deadline to apply is May 6.

div.p: Office Hours Monday - Friday 8:00 am to 4:00 pm
Summer Hours Monday - Thursday 8:00 am to 4:00 pm - Closed for lunch 12:00 to 1:00

Cooper ISD Board of Trustees Election
2020 Election Day: May 2, 2020 postponed until November 3, 2020.
Cooper ISD 's General Election scheduled for May 2, 2020 is postponed until November 3, 2020. Two Trustee Positions will be on the ballot to serve a three-year term.
La Elección General de Cooper ISD programada para el 2 de mayo de 2020 fue postergada para el 3 de noviembre de 2020. Dos Las Posiciones de Síndico aparecerán en la boleta de votación para cumplir mandatos de tres años.
Misty Bates Elections Administrator

span.span: Our mission is to graduate all students with the necessary educational and social skills to maximize and attain personal and professional goals.

div.p: Cooper ISD does not discriminate on the basis of sex, disability, ethnicity, race, color, or national origin in its education programs or employment, as required by Title IX, Section 504 and Title VI.
